exclusion:
1. Connect power supply  to motor and connect the external module to motor external connector,  and Make sure the module is located within direct range of the Z-Wave controller.
  2. Set the controller into the exclusion/remove mode (refer to controller’s operating manual).
  3. Click the PB-button triple times in 1.5 second, located left side of the motor external box.
  4. Curtain motor will be detected and excluded from the Z-Wave network.
inclusion:
1. Connect power supply  to motor and connect the external module to motor external connector,  and Make sure the module is located within direct range of the Z-Wave controller.
  2. Set the controller into the inclusion/add mode (refer to controller’s operating manual).
  3. Click the PB-button triple times in 1.5 second, located left side of the motor external box.
  4. Curtain motor will be detected and included in the Z-Wave network.
label: SK-3007-05
overview: The SK-3007-05 external module extends traditional curtain motors with zwave capability.

parameters.label: Current Motor Position
parameters.overview: Support Get only, feedback motor current position(0x00-0x63, 0xFE)

parameters.label: Set motor direction
parameters.description: Toggle motor direction between reverse and default
parameters.overview: Support Set only. Toggle motor direction between reverse and default as send out set command with any value (0x00-0xFF).

parameters.label: Clear motor lead tail endpoint setting
parameters.description: Clear motor lead tail endpoint setting
parameters.overview: Support Set only.  Clear motor lead tail endpoint setting as send out set command with any value (0x00-0xFF).

parameters.label: Enable manual pull function
parameters.overview: Support Set only. Enable manual pull function as send out set command with any value (0x00-0xFF).

parameters.label: Disable manual pull function
parameters.overview: Support Set only. Disable manual pull function as send out set command with any value (0x00-0xFF).

associations.label: Lifeline
associations.description: Z-Wave Plus Lifeline, is assigned to send motor lifeline status to associated devices, including send the multilevel report frame while window cover position, send device local reset frame while set factory default manually etc.
